We recently had the pleasure of working with James for our full bathroom renovation, and couldn‚Äôt be happier with the results.

James handled everything‚Äîorganizing all the trades, managing the project, and making sure things ran smoothly. He was always on time, super proactive, and never once complained, even when we threw a few extra tasks his way. It was such a relief having someone who genuinely cared about getting everything perfect.

Our bathroom looks amazing, and we genuinely couldn‚Äôt recommend James enough

James and the team were amazing with fitting out my clinic. Highly professional team and were upfront throughout the process. I would 100% recommend these guys!
Thanks again

James and his team renovated my bathroom.  They were dependable and performed solid work.  When circumstances demanded improvisation, James was highly adaptable--suggesting beneficial changes to the original plans.  His useful advice received my quick approval.  James finished on time and on budget and he provided frequent informative updates (with photos).  Throughout the project, there were prompt responses to questions and easy communication in general.  I have no hesitation in strongly recommending JLC for similar renovations.

James from JLC Carpentry is the epitome of professionalism. He was punctual, efficient, and built an outstanding pergola that exceeded my expectations. The final product showcases his exceptional craftsmanship and attention to detail. I couldn‚Äôt be happier and highly recommend JLC Carpentry for top-notch work! Will definitely be using James again for any future work at my property.

Highly recommend James!
He was professional and efficient with all the work he has already completed  so far!
He completed an awesome project at my Salon- and he has also assisted with detailed work in my apartment.

Excellent work!

Many thanks to James for all his hard work he put in to help us finish our dream home. His professionalism was evident from his first visit to confirm measurements & advice us on what needed to be done. He was hard working, punctual & managed to finish what we needed done in a short time frame.  His work ethic, communication & skill set was fantastic & I can‚Äôt recommend James highly enough.

I recently engaged JLC to undertake a feature wall project in our Southbank office. James was engaging and understood our project intent. He attended the office, provided a competitive quote and sourced quality timber to complete the project. On-site the team were on time, produced a great product and cleaned any waste. Highly recommended
